description: Message that gets sent out when the source state changes
title: State change event

source_id.description: ID of the source that holds the state that has changed

creation_timestamp.description: Timestamp that indicates when the message was created

origin_timestamp.description: Timestamp that indicates when the message that triggered this message (if any) was created

action_timestamp.description: Timestamp that indicates when the state change described in the event took or will take place
